subject: Self Care
title: Physical Symptoms of Burnout
description: A micro-lesson that makes Physical Symptoms of Burnout usable.

hook.text: Headaches, insomnia, stomach problems, constant colds. Her doctor found nothing wrong. The body was speaking for the mind.

buildup.text: Burnout suppresses the immune system. Chronic cortisol elevation makes the body vulnerable to illness and pain.

discovery.text: Common physical signs: tension headaches, digestive issues, muscle pain, heart palpitations, and chronic fatigue.

twist.text: People treat the symptoms individually â€” painkillers, antacids, sleeping pills â€” without addressing the root cause.

climax.text: When your body sends multiple stress signals, connect the dots. It's not separate issues. It's one system overwhelmed.

punchline.text: Your body keeps the score. Multiple symptoms mean one cause.

quiz.question: Why does burnout cause so many physical symptoms?
options: Chronic cortisol suppresses immunity and damages the body
Physical symptoms are unrelated to burnout
